episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" features facts about a unique piano linked to Benny from ABBA, the creation of a 'daddy short legs' spider, a 246-year-old pot plant at Kew Gardens, and red pandas' preference for artificial sweeteners. The hosts delve into these topics with humor and interesting anecdotes.

facts.fact: There's a special piano that only Benny from ABBA can play and he can only play it if he's six miles away from it.
By changing the genome of a daddy long legs, scientists have created a daddy short legs.
Kew Gardens has managed to keep the same pot plant alive for 246 years.
